data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Bács-Kiskun, Hungary today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bács-Kiskun, Hungary
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Bács-Kiskun, Hungary. Please, stir the 16,315 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 32 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Bács-Kiskun, Hungary that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 32 neighbors who are far from you in Bács-Kiskun. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Jew, Hungarian-speaking people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Jew, Hungarian-speaking people.
Jesus, please give your people in Bács-Kiskun, Hungary a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Bács-Kiskun, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bács-Kiskun, Hungary has a population of 534,000.

We estimate Bács-Kiskun has 16,315 people who might know Jesus, 448,446 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 69,238 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 32 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Bács-Kiskun, Hungary that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ
